website_summaries.verdict: Features a unique design that doubles as a rotating walker and play center for older babies.
pros: Detachable walker moves around the play center in an effective combination of education, exercise, and play
A variety of brightly colored toys offer 15 activities, including silly sounds and music
Walker can be removed, allowing the play center to be used as a stand alone item for toddlers
cons: No height adjustment on the walker for taller babies

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment for the baby and the rest of the family
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my very active 9 month old and he LOVES IT! It didn't take him any time at all to figure out how to walk in it and he hasn't been walking at all yet. Less than an hour after we got it and he was basically running in circles with this toy. The activity table is interesting to him and so far he enjoys the toys. I do wish it had lights and more musical options but overall this is a big win for containing a crawling and busy baby. A+.
customer_reviews.author: Angela O

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby item I have ever bought. This was purchased for my nephew as an alternative to a walker in a home with a lot of stairs. He absolutely loves it. It is very sturdy and whether he is scooting around it or his older brother is pushing him around, it does not tip or lean. The baby loves walking around playing with the toys and is consistently entertained. Highly, highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Salts

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 months old and loves this toy! It keeps him busy and entertained for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Tlt981

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy Purchase to Date
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best purchases we have ever made. We recently bought this for my 8 month old, he is in love! It is a fantastic toy with bright colors. It is great to use as an activity table, but most of all to run laps. He loves to run constantly in it in circles. Makes me dizzy just watching him! We thought about buying one when my other children were young, but never did, I wish we did! It is built very well and is not very hard to put together. If I could have given it more stars I would have.
customer_reviews.author: SkiAlly

customer_reviews.title: I can finally get things done around the house now!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter absolutely loves this. She's 7 months old and loves walking (sometimes even running) around and around this, while stopping and playing with literally every item on her way around. Keeps her entertained for hours!
customer_reviews.author: A. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poorly made product. Food on parts.
customer_reviews.text: I have never been more disappointed in Amazon than I am now. After waiting one week to receive this item off of Amazon PRIME I was extremely excited when it finally came in. I opened immediately only to find random, opened/broken parts thrown in a box with FOOD on them. It was disgusting honestly. It looked as if I got the box of all the random returned parts. Sending back immediately. We attempted to put it together but it is such a jumbled mess I'm done messing with it. Very cheaply made product for how expensive it was.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & fun for a couple of years
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for pre-walkers, wannabe walkers, and toddlers. I've got 2 grandchildren, and when they come to my house, they can't wait to get into this toy. The seat easily revolves around the playtable in any direction, and the child can turn around within the seat. Even if they can't yet use their legs to push it along, they are entertained and safe. The construction is simple and it's well made. There's several interesting toys on the table, and room for a child's food or bottle if you wish. Also there's a sturdy loop to attach your other toys to. It does occupy a fair amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: Jd723

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but easily scoots around
customer_reviews.text: My baby boy loves it better than his exersaucer and bouncer, and I love it as well. The only negative is once they get about 7 months old (he's 8 m/o now), they can throw their weight around and move it across the room. If their was a suction cup or something on the bottom to get it to stay in place, it would get 5 stars. But it doesn't keep him in one spot in the room like I was hoping. I could have gotten him a regular walker had I known this. The table part is great, though and we love it other than the fact that it can scoot across the room.
customer_reviews.author: CTT82615

customer_reviews.title: Loved concept but screws missing; customer service not helpful
customer_reviews.text: Was so looking forward to granddaughter's using it next week, and spent a LONG time picking it out... Love the concept but waited until now to assemble. There are screws missing (maybe other assembly problems but haven't gotten that far into the assembly). Shame on me for not looking at the MOST RECENT reviews which are more negative. Manufacturer's customer service says "screws not available, contact Amazon". That won't work for me, and it looks like some reviewers have been waiting a long time for a replacement that was also bad, so I will get some screws at hardware store and hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: I hated putting this together
customer_reviews.text: I hated putting this together. The tiny screws go through the hole provided and it was hard to get the red part to line up. I have put many toys, cribs, swings, etc. together and this was the worst! Maybe I got a defective one? Anyway, I bought this based off of the reviews but I may be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Goss

customer_reviews.title: 3 babies and all 3 love this!
customer_reviews.text: It grows with them with buckles under the seat, which is washable for those blowouts and spit ups. Started the last one in it at 5 months. I dont remember how old the first two were when they started in it, but I do remember it was one of the few items we actually used in every capacity advertised. Much safer than the cheap little walkers they roll around the house with and crash into things. Worth every penny and with our last one (this baby was a surprise as soon as we sold off all our baby stuff) it resells easy so you get some of your money back too!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Grant

customer_reviews.title: Think ours was defective
customer_reviews.text: So I have purchased this before for my daughter who's now 12. It worked perfectly! Unfortunately, the new ones don't seem to be constructed as well. The two red parts that snap together to support the table don't stay together (even when screwed in). This creates a gap and the instruction manual clearly states that this should not occur. However the screws provided don't seem long enough which is likely the cause. Also the battery operated toy didn't work. This was the last straw so I dissembled and returned to Amazon. Waiting on my refund now...
customer_reviews.author: J.B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made – could not assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We were unable to assemble this product. The Plastic of the base was so cheap that the screws just went right through and didn’t catch on anything. I have no idea how the product because once it’s assembled because we didn’t get past the on boxing and the first attempt to put the base together. It refused to snap together and then the screws wouldn’t catch so we put it back in the box and got a refund. I will say from glancing at all of the parts it looks extremely cheaply made and of extremely poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eva A

customer_reviews.title: My oldest was 2 yrs old and loved to push my 10 month old around on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the tables/seats for my 2nd son a few years back. My oldest was 2 yrs old and loved to push my 10 month old around on the seat! They absolutely loved it. Played forever with it! Brothers <3 Well, I have another baby now and had given my other one away. So I bought this again brand new. Once again, they love it. And now my 4 yr old and 2 yr old like to interact with the babe while he is on it. Worth every penny and makes great bonding time.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Baby (and toddler) Love It! Independent entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old has been using this activity center for a couple of months now. She likes it, and I believe it gives her a sense of independence. There are plenty of toys to keep her interested and also a spot where we add our own to change things up for her a bit. This activity center is A LOT safer than a traditional walker that allows baby to go anywhere he can roll. I highly recommend buying this activity center new and not through Amazon’s “open box” deals. I purchased “open box” and the penguins on top are cracked and one of the screws was missing to hold the center together.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced cheap plastic but entertains the baby
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 5 month old and it didn't interest him until closer to 6 months. But now he loves it and is starting to interact with the toys more and more. Initially, he was just excited to be moving around! I will say that I feel the product is overpriced and we had some troubles assembling the product due to the poor quality. It's just a bunch of cheap plastic and the screws fell right through a piece we tried to attach. We had to run to the hardware store and find tiny washers to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: No lights . Bad suction on toy elephant
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as discribed. Had to returned it. It’s a great idea that why I purchased it but it does not even light up. What toy that big for an infant does not light up. How are you supposed to get their attention? By sound only? When you push the elephant down it spins and is supposed to come back up but it didn’t it stayed down. Only thing attention grabbing in the tiny piano and again , does not light up. Awaiting refund.
customer_reviews.author: TONASHA

customer_reviews.title: Cute and baby loves!
customer_reviews.text: This activity center is very compact and keeps my little occupied busy. Baby can run around and around table while stopping to play with all the gadgets. It was not very easy to put together. It has roughly 1 million pieces and all the Instructions were pictures only. It’s also not easy to move. Kinda clunky. Overall i think we will enjoy it for many years as eventually you remove the seat and the kid can still use the activity table. Not sure why the review asked “suction power”, I don’t know how that would apply here.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: ugh
customer_reviews.text: i love the concept of this product. . but the red middle part is a pain in the ass to put together correctly with no gaps.. & even after an hour of trying to make sure there wasnt a gap theres STILL a gap.. i need to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: tay & kevin

customer_reviews.title: this is probably the best seat/toy/thing I have purchased for my child
customer_reviews.text: Listen, this is probably the best seat/toy/thing I have purchased for my child. Even before he could crawl, he would run circles around the table! Anything that keeps my 6 month old busy for an hour or more makes me a happy momma!
customer_reviews.author: SkinGuru

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Design
customer_reviews.text: To be straight, our kid absolutely loves this thing. He runs around it and loves to play with the toys. Just be aware that the design kinda blows. The table top doesn't stay in place, which can become a hazard, and the base juts out in such a way that it stops the smooth running around it. It gets caught up on an edge in the base, which stops him in his tracks. So, overall, the concept is good, but they just didn't test it to ensure that its design stood up to real everyday use. Kinda disappointed for the price. Yeah, it's plastic, but if you're going to make something, make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Endymion Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Best all around activity center
customer_reviews.text: we absolutely loooove this thing. Our 4 month old would much rather stand than lay down. So once i saw this i knew it was going to be perfect and he loves it. He can 1.) make it all the way around with the wheels, they are super helpful 2.) all the toy attachments are reachable for him to get except for one, the skinny elephant but i push that for him. 3.) assembly was extremely easy too. Lastly, once he's old enough he be out of the chair the chair part detaches and then its a activity center table with a spot for his drink and some snacks. He will have this for awhile such a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Nikitha Maccherone

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and how the seat moves around... but one the mirror toys WAS BROKEN!!! And it threw everything down for me there is noone you can contact to replace it, it's just something that I have to sit with. And would love for if it has lights instead of only animal and piano noises.
customer_reviews.author: GirlyBarbie

customer_reviews.title: Watch and they will Love This Toy!
customer_reviews.text: This was something that wasn't thought of being anything. Once the grandson hit the weight, he began moving his legs in a walking motion! 6 months!! Maybe even earlier? They Spin and Go with them not knowing they are learing the skills of walking! Then to begin to go backwards!! The family will Smile and Laugh when they continue around and stopping to play with the different settings! Turning the page for one. Making the Whale spin the fishy! Once they learn how to do these steps of life, You will see why you bought this!! They will begin to entertain themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this toy
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this toy. It's perfect for a baby ready to be on the go but not physically ready yet. She loves running around it. Only 4 stars because it's baffling there's nothing in it that lights up and there's no where to hook toys. She got bored of the toys it came with pretty quickly, but we've gotten creative as to how to attach her other favorites to keep it fresh. Also really wish the bottom was weighted. Our 6 month old can easily drag the whole toy across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: It's junk....
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk. Don't even entertain the idea. In theory it seems like a great idea, however, when you get it that is another story. One of the legs don't fit on there. It's over flimsy. Not very good quality at all. Wish I would've taken a video of how the pieces don't fit together.
customer_reviews.author: Elle_C

customer_reviews.title: pretty good, could use a better seat.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this activity/play table and would have given it 5 starts but my little one (almost 6mo) legs are rubbed almost raw from the seat after like 10min of use. Other than that we love it and a few of our friends that have younger babies like it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Keller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. My baby loves that he can walk around the entertainment center while getting to each toy. My only concern is one of the toys falls off repeatedly. My husband screwed it back on, but it doesn't last. It falls off again. It maybe a defective piece. But overall, it's a great toy to add for my baby boy. It takes up a bit of space, so I recommend having a big clear area.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Super fun toy that grows with baby
customer_reviews.text: Super fun for your little one! I bought this for my 8 month old with hopes he would get lasting use out of it. He LOVES it! The toys on it are super fun and keep his attention and it did not take him long to figure out how to get around the table. Can’t wait til he is zooming around it. It’s way sturdier than I thought it would be and I have zero worries about it tipping. Wish I would have had this for my other kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: KPat

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it but we had to do additional work to make it work correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Update at the bottom. Overall this was a great walker. At first my daughter couldn’t figure it out, now almost a month later she is running in circles. Only thing that was an issue is that the center plastic pieces that you screw together wouldn’t get tight enough and it would cause a crack in the plastic and it would stop the walker from going all the way around. We ended up fixing it but it was such an inconvenience. UPDATE: not even 3 months after we got this walker the lion no longer clicks and doesn’t stay upright.
customer_reviews.author: Betts

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. We don’t have solid floors for a more traditional walker so this was a great alternative for us. We have too much carpet! What I don’t like about it is that when we try to move it, it comes apart to easy and at first I was afraid to let my kid play on it. I also feel like there should be another way to adjust the height. I have a really tall kiddo and I am afraid he won’t get to use it very long. But other than that it’s nice. Also I feel like it’s a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: pettijohnjj

customer_reviews.title: Best activity center
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after seeing a friend have it and wow has it been the best investment for our 8 month old son. He gets bored in the stationary one we had and this allows him to run around and play with different toys or simply in circles. It does not work the best on thicker carpet right away, so if you have carpet run it in a circle a few times to make a groove. Overall, 10/10 will be purchasing this for any baby shower I am apart of in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. I was originally worried about how heavy the base was and would it tip over, but there is no problem with that. The base is heavy enough and has rubber pads under it so that it doesn't move. Also the seat is well designed so that the baby rides fairly low, so no danger of tipping over. Turns easily around the center and the seat also turns easily in the holder so the baby can turn around easily. Works great. My grandson loves it, and I know he can't get into anything from there.
customer_reviews.author: A Freese

customer_reviews.title: 9 months of entertainment so far
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best toy I've purchased for my child. We bought it for him at 4 months and it took him no time to figure out how to walk in it. Now at 13 months, he still loves it! We took the seat off and he cruises around and plays on it. My only complaint is that the spinning ball has a bunch of tiny balls inside it as well as a decorative piece centered in it and the little balls get stuck between that piece and the wall of the ball, so there are very few tiny balls left free. Even with that said, this toy is still and excellent choice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This activity center is amazing! My daughter began using it when she was eight months old and still loves it now at almost ten months. She has lots of fun on it. Would definitely recommend. The only thing is we don't leave her in it too long since it's not good for the development of their feet for walking. So we put her in it maybe twenty minutes total a day. She loves it though. Totally satisfied with his purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie0523

customer_reviews.title: Broke the next day assembled.
customer_reviews.text: One of the rattles was easily broken by my 6 months old baby girl on the next day she uses. It almost hurt her eyes when it broke. I had to email the manufacturer (Kids2.com) to replace it, and their customer service was THE MOST TERRIBLE one I've ever experienced. They asked me to destroy the product and send them at least 10 different angles of photos of the destroyed toy which is ridiculous enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: EVERY baby loves this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Every baby loves this thing!! Best baby toy! If I could only have one baby toy/activity, hands down this would be it. I bought an older version of this same toy five years ago for my oldest. My second kiddo also used it, and we shared it with several other families. Finally we gave it away, and then we bought this one for our third kiddo. This one sadly, seems a little lower quality than the original. One of the toys broke off within the first month or two. But it's still our favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 for comfort and safety
customer_reviews.text: This around we go activity center was designed comfort and safety. It allows the freedom of movement without the dangers of a walker. The product is safe and sturdy and the seat is soft enough to be comfortable. The product is easy to put together but a standard screw driver will not open battery comartment for the piano. This is the only design flaw I noticed. I love that everything can be quickly and easily detached for washing. This product was one of the best baby purchases we have made.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is genius! My little one wants to always feel like he is walking with a purpose. His jumper upsets him once he realizes he isnt technicay going anywhere. This toy was easy to assemble. It's fairly easy to wipe off and clean. I love the tray for putting little snacks in for him to grab. The only complaint is that the wheels make a high pitch noise when rolling. I'm sure ita nothing a little WD40 cant fix tho!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fun and safe
customer_reviews.text: I have boy/girl twins, one is tall and thin, the other shirt and chunky. They've been using this for over 2 months and both of them love it. Now that they are more mobile I often find the one out of the chair standing and playing with the one in the chair. Gives them exercise and entertainment while remaining in a safe location. Easy to clean, the seat insert removed to be thrown in the wash, everything ends can be stored down with ease. I don't find the noises annoying, and you can attach other toys to a few locations to add something new if you like. Has held up great so far, so I'd say it's pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Grudowski

customer_reviews.title: Life changing infant station
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 6.5 month son and he absolute loves this! He's 9 months now and still is fascinated with it. We didn't want him to be in something that let him wander just anywhere and this worked perfect for that. He is just now starting to crawl, and has always preferred to have us hold him in a standing position, so this was a great bridge until he can start being mobile independently.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Younker

customer_reviews.title: If you are on the fence with this- buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! Our son is 10 months and we got it for him a few months ago. He is almost ready to start walking and I would contribute some of him walking so early to this! Once he figured it out he was going in circles like crazy. All of the things on top keep his attention- I can put him in this and get a few things done! It is very sturdy even when he gets going real fast. It seems a little shaky when you get it but he’s been pretty crazy in it and it has yet to tip! Would 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dana M Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: I want to give bad stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I was so excited that I finally remembered to buy batteries for it when I went to the grocery store (it did not come with any) However the keyboard/book station does not work I don’t know how to get into contact with the sler so I hope they see this and get in touch with me I paid too much for any part of it not to work
customer_reviews.author: Celeste D Honea

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait until my 3rd baby to get this? My boy LOVED this thing. My older kids LOVED it as well. You cannot be mad or grumpy when your lil' babe is tearin' it up in this. I regret selling it once he outgrew it (15 months) but know someone else is enjoying it now. I will certainly get again in the future when I am a grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Mamashebear

customer_reviews.title: Love It 😍
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My baby hasn't used it yet, he is 8 weeks , we put him in the seat but his feet don't touch the ground yet 😂 I purchased because of the price. I had been watching it and have seen it be as high as $100, so when it was a little over $50 I jumped on it. Assembly was easy, did it myself in about 20 minutes. Directions are poor though, strictly pictures. I'm sure my little guy will love it in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: AmyT

customer_reviews.title: After 3 kids it's still a household favorite
customer_reviews.text: Both my sons had this (both used the same one we pulled out of storage after 5 years) and that one worked great and lasted forever. It was in full working condition when we got rid of it when moving and not planning on another baby at that time. We purchased a new one for our new addition and still love this for them to play. This was a little more work to assemble but only took about 15 mins and it was ready for the baby to play. I know my first 2 did 100k miles going around that table and I'm sure this one will get just as much workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loves this. He had a entertainment jumper which he loves, but he was showing signs of walking so we purchased this. The toys on top are very cute and he plays with all of them and he loves walking around to play woth all of the toys. The only thing I wish it had was more of an adjustment for height ...he has longer legs. Overall we arr very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Works on carpet, yay!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun center; works on carpet, smooth movement, interesting activities, not annoying music/sounds, height-adjustable, no pinch or safety issues- love for keeping baby safe (and letting her burn off energy!) while getting housework done! Pro tip: look up instructions for assembly online and download PDF for text instructions; package only had pictures which is do-able but the written version makes it much faster!
customer_reviews.author: MotJuste

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loves this, he loves all the toys and how much independence this gives him. I love that I don't have to worry about baby proofing the stairs yet and he can use a walker. The only issue I had during assembly was the red stand doesn't perfectly line up even after fastening the screws in place. Still sturdy and doesn't affect how this walker works, but the small gap at the top is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must HavecFor Baby
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old grandson loves this. I wish I would have bought it a few months earlier. I also wish that this had been around when my 3 year old grandson was a baby. My son has one at home too. Honestly it works better on his wood floors versus my carpet. It works on the carpet, just not as well. Also note that it takes up alot of space. More than the jumparoo. All in all it is awesome. I wish that I would have had it by 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clements

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s fav!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second unit we have purchased and still have no regrets! Our last baby loved it so much! We gave that one away to a friend when he put grew it. Then had another baby and knew we had to buy another. She loves it just as much! It’s a safe way for them to practice walking without the worry of getting stuck or falling in a traditional walker! She loves all of the activity toys on it, especially the piano! Highly recommend this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C.

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with this product. My 8 month old daughter loves it! And it is so much fun to watch her play in it. The only thing that irritated me what putting it together, the main stand piece was a pain to get together and the directions were not very well detailed. But overall I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey K.

customer_reviews.title: The baby seems to like it. It feels pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The baby seems to like it. It feels pretty sturdy, which I was surprised about. I figured there would have been a suction cup or something to get it to stick to the ground, but seems like it is counter balanced. Putting it together was easy. Only negative is that two of the catches were broke (where you attach the seat cover). Hopefully that doesn't mean some wear-and-tear will make the seat not usable. Hopefully that part can be replaced if so. It's a fun toy for your little one. 5 star product for sure...just wish mine didn't have the two broken catches.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this activity center. The most important thing about it is that the child is safer than in a walker that moves around the room. They get the same amount of exercise but cannot get into trouble pulling things down on them or flying down the stairs. The seat can turn towards or away from the table. It also can be locked in place when eating. This is the 4th one I have purchased. Each child enjoyed it and was passed to a younger sibling.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E

customer_reviews.title: Love this walker
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter and we (especially her) love it. One of the best baby purchases we have ever made. Even her physical therapist loves it. She plays with EVERY TOY. She also loves the snack tray: she can make a pass around, grab a snack, and do it all again. She started out slow but now she basically sprints around the table screaming with glee. THE ONE THING TO WATCH OUT FOR: it is easy to put together if you watch a video on YouTube. The instructions are hard to understand. If the base doesn't come together nicely, return it and get a replacement. It is SO worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Clesceri

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Them Busy!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these at my house and bought this for my daughters house. The toddler absolutely loves it. Even now, when he is too big for the seat, he plays with it. It works great for when the baby is smaller and not quit mobile also. It is unique in that the child is able to sit in the seat and propel himself around the table to the different activities. When they get too big to sit in the seat, it can be removed to allow for just table activity. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: k john

customer_reviews.title: Very DISSATISFIED with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought Bright Starts 3 in 1 around walker activity center on January 16, 2020 it was delivered on 01/17/2020. Today 04/29/2020 my Grandson was strapped in the walker and it snapped away from the base, my Grandson feel forward on his face, needless to say he was hysterically crying, upset and scared, my daughter in law was just as scared for the safety of her child and was extremely upset as am I. I am NOT at all satisfied with this product and now I am past the due date to return this product back to Amazon. I do hope someone contacts me from Amazon after reading this review. TOTALLY DISSATISFIED CUSTOMER.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever! Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: My little guy started using this around 5 months old. He didn't do much at first with it -- just sat in it and poked at some of the toys. But then one day he realized he could move in circles around the table (probably around 6 months old). He spent hours a day just walking in circles, giggling, playing with all the toys. Now at nearly 8 months he runs so fast he actually moves the center table with him! It's hilarious to watch. He's probably just about outgrown it now that he's able to move the table (I don't want him to accidentally tip it over). It's provided 3 months of pure entertainment. Definitely a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rodalorn

customer_reviews.title: So much FUN!
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun watching our little kid run around in circles with this toy. It has truly been a great time for him. I would definitely recommend this to any parent for their little one who is learning to walk. It's so much better than traditional walkers. I'm looking forward to gifting it to another parent.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Longoria, MSM

customer_reviews.title: I Love it and so my son!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and so do I. It just seem like the basr and middle red piece couls be made with a little more quality. Which is why I am giving it 4 stars. It was easy to put together, except for the middle red piece didn't align right and one of the holes for the screws (on the middle red piece) was too big. So the screw just went straight through the hole and doesn't help connect tge 2 pieces together. Other then that, no complaints! The toys are great and seem to entertainment my son! I love how I don't have to worry about where he is, as I would with a normal walker
customer_reviews.author: hnadkins

customer_reviews.title: Baby toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I was pregnant, didnt open till baby was 4 months old.. that being said everything was in the box and my husband put it together easily. Baby can move and I saw some reviews about carpet, depending on what kind I guess my son moves around on carpet no problems and the toys stay on quite nice and are easily to grab
customer_reviews.author: Richard Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this! She zooms around like crazy! It keeps her entertained for quite a while if I need to get a couple things done around the house. Sometimes she gets going really fast and it will move but not enough to tip over - she also may be outgrowing it. Best purchase I’ve made during her first year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many fun things in the middle to also keep entertained when ...
customer_reviews.text: Little boy this was purchased for absolutely adores it, and everyone that has seen him in it has wanted to know where they can purchase one for their child or as a gift for a niece, nephew, grandson, etc. It is very entertaining and allows parents to get things done without the worry of littles motoring around down stairs, to plants for a taste, or getting under foot. He has even learned how to go around backwards! So many fun things in the middle to also keep entertained when they stop walking or running around it.
customer_reviews.author: CalamityAsh

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Use daily with 5+ month old. Have used for a few months with no problems. Keeps curious mind entertained so mom can get things picked up and cleaned up, playing with different sections and just running around. Well constructed, sturdy, not too bad to put together. Lots of parts but easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Nice but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This item is very cool but putting it together might make you crazy. The screws are difficult to get in and the red middle piece in the center is flimsy. The battery compartment screw is terribly difficult to unscrew and open. Just a small note, this thing does not light up at all. I'm just happy we got the thing together. The spinning around the edge is cool. On a big upside, the toys on this are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ferrick Family

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My son was mainly concerned about going in circles as fast as possible, but that doesn’t mean he didn’t love it. Now that he’s cruising, I’ve taken away the spinner and he loves to pull up on it and play with the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Riette

customer_reviews.title: a favorite toy in our house
customer_reviews.text: Both of our grandchildren absolutely loved this walk around activity center. It's proven to be safe, durable, and loads of fun for our little ones. I highly recommend this for little ones just learning to support their weight on their legs up to the time they are walking and running around.
customer_reviews.author: lo24

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was not too fun to assemble, but overall the product and its quality are great! We are keeping this in our household for the next baby if we are blessed enough to have another. My son loved this and since he is a toddler now, he uses it without the chair attachment. You will love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Vick

customer_reviews.title: Hands down they best investment I have made out of every single item ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands down they best investment I have made out of every single item I have ever purchased for my son. He ABSOLUTELY LOVES this toy. He spins around in it like a Tasmanian devils and just laughs I also place his small toys on top and he place with them as he is spinning around. He is currently 10 months old and still using.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! We absolutely love this activity center! We got it for our grandson, he loves it! He loves running around the activity center, he likes to play with everything on it, and then he stops for a drink and snack. He would spend hours in it if we let him. We’re even thinking about getting another one so we don’t have to tote it back and forth from my daughter’s house! If you can’t get things done around the house and entertain the baby this is for you! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Turner

customer_reviews.title: Make sure sound/melodies work before fully installing
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and had so much potential for fun. Unfortunately after installing it and not even a day of use by our 8month old - it's already broken. No melodies, no sound, nothing. It's just a silent round about toy 😕
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! My son loves it and can be in it for some time. Only wish they made a toy that can support his posture so I could leave him a bit longer there. He almost 7 mo and 17lbs. I am 105lbs so yeah I need a small break. Other than that highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is great, my daughter loves it! The only problem I had was when putting it together one of the screws went straight through the plastic but there were enough screw points that the one didn’t matter. It does move around a lot if it’s on tile, but I just put a piece of non slip pad under it(the kind for under rugs) and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very stimulating and fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son at 4 months old, at 1st a was bit too tiny. We just put a pillow under his feet. My son loved this immediately, once we showed him what to do with each section. He still loves it, it is very stimulating for him and he will walk/run round and round until he tired himself out. This is perfect if you don't have a ton of space and want to save your walls from walkers. I recommend 100 percent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I've invested in.
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. My little girl is getting a head start on walking and balance. She started using this product at 5 months. We did not want to buy a jumper. We felt like a jumper would create a bad habit and slow down learning to walk by allowing her to just jump up and down. This product is like having a good exersaucer with lots of toys, and walker in 1. It however does not have any light up toys..
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Garbulinski

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have! Every baby NEEDS this!
customer_reviews.text: For a younger baby, you can put blankets around the baby so he/she can use it. You'd be amazed how fast the baby will learn to play with the toys and walk around it. It allows babies to be mobile in a safe way. It also entertains the baby. You can also attach other toys with links to this as well. Excellent toy!
customer_reviews.author: successb440

customer_reviews.title: She hasn't grown bored of it and it's really the only thing she's ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this and so do I since she can walk around, but not go where I don't want her. She hasn't grown bored of it and it's really the only thing she's okay being in. I do wish the toys did more but she seems happy with them. I can think of some improvements, but seeing as how I did not find any other walkers like this being sold I am very happy I was able to get this one. The price is reasonable as well.
customer_reviews.author: ToriGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great For Baby!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it, I really wish this company would come out with a few new looks for this around we go item. Overall, it has a good bit of toys to keep baby busy, the music sounds good, and we love putting it on patio by pool. She loves walking, and this toy allows her to walk without being a danger of actually moving. Also doesn't get stuck in a corner like a walker. Wish I had it with my first two children :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I hesitated getting "another" thing to add to the clutter but thought I'd give it a try! Glad I did. My daughter wasn't a fan of the jumper but loved this. Yes, it takes some space but the concept is nice because unlike the walker, it's stationary, the the child won't go where they are not to!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes being in this. At 7 months he was able to move it around the circle table and even spin in the seat. His older brother (2) liked to push him around, too. Just wish it was easier to move. Base falls off.
customer_reviews.author: JBraught

customer_reviews.title: One of our best purchases 2 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews but this product has been one of the best things we purchased for our grandson 2 years ago. It is well thought out, well made and has entertained him for 2 years. It cleans up very well and will now be put away for a younger brother or sister! He had a blast "chasing" us around and around. We called it the "go round." He loved all of the little activity stations. This is a purchase that we do not regret and would recommend to any parent or to anyone giving a gift. What a great way to give them some independence and exploration time!
customer_reviews.author: NJC

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my baby's legs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy, but unfortunately the seat even though it's cloth has cut her poor little legs and left scabs. Her feet reach the ground and she has no problem holding herself up but this toy has caused her so much discomfort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... grandson who is 6 months old and he immediately loved it! Runs around it so proud of himself ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson who is 6 months old and he immediately loved it! Runs around it so proud of himself that he's not just walking, but running! The activities on it are intriguing to him and I love that there's one spot where you can hook dangling things off of. So many possibilities to play with. Plus it's sturdy enough he can pull up on it, too. Best baby toy and so reasonably priced for what you get! Super easy to put together, too.
customer_reviews.author: krista

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble not practical
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my grandson. He hardly used it. Absolutely hated going around where actually could not face the toys as his body position is on the side. I think a regular walker would of been better. Would of returned it but it was truly a nightmare to put together in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: This toy is SO fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim and it has turned our to be our daughters favorite toy! She can run so fast and loves being able to move around so much. It has definitely helped her learn to walk and stand better. It is nice because she can move around instead of staying in one spot in a jumping toy. So fun, and would totally recommend to buy for yourself or give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Austin

customer_reviews.title: Pedestal Poorly Designed
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is straight forward requiring only a Philips head screwdriver. The pedestal comes in two halves that are supposed to snap together and then receive screws, however, they don't match up perfectly and when the two middle screws are put in they get pulled through the holes because the screw heads are too small. I used industrial cable ties to secure the two halves. The wheels, rotating center, and toys seem to be good quality, but definitely not worth $80. It also does take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Even small babies can pull it around the room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who isn't crawling yet loves to run in circles with this toy. The only real problem is that she's discovered that she can drag it across the wooden floor and access things that she otherwise wouldn't be able to reach. She pulls it around the room with ease and gets into everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Look away!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy honestly!! Not safe!!!!! I repeat not safe!!! When your kid walks around the table it moves it’s not sturdy at all!! Cheaply made!! A bad product honestly! I would say it’s nice for looks but that’s alll!! Don’t waste you money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For an Active Baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 month p-old great granddaughter. She loves it. It is used daily. Her 2 year-old sister is jealous and she uses it, even though she is too tall for it. She rotates around the axis and the seat rotates almost 360 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I have a nine month boy and he recently started standing and taking a few steps. He loved this toy because it was fast and he could go in circles so he started running in this and eventually this thing tipped over. This toy does not have any weight in the middle and if you have an active boy like I do, I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ha

customer_reviews.title: This came to me warped.
customer_reviews.text: Warped with no screws. It did not come from an amazon box but in it's own box. That's fine. But came to me warped and missing the screws needed to even assemble. HUGE SHAME because my little boy really wants to start walking. BOTH of the leg strength products I've bought, have both been downers.. This one being the most saddening one to get. Might work for other people, did not come out good for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! This is so great for entertaining and also good for teaching how to walk! My baby loves it and spend lots of time in it! He started using it at about 4.5 months and still uses it at 10 months now! It’s by far one of his favorite toys/activities!
customer_reviews.author: RWC customer

customer_reviews.title: The best toy to get your little one walking!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this. She will cry in regular walkers, but she loves running around in this. She was 11 months old when we got it for her. You can attach other toys that have the ring for cribs and bouncers on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Willow Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this, however the seat is less than desirable as this was purchased a little over a month ago and the strap under the seat has already come apart with no way to repair. My son is only 18 lbs. They need to go back to the drawing board on the seat strap construction. Would love to just replace the cloth portion, however do not believe this is an option.
customer_reviews.author: Specialk87

customer_reviews.title: Great item!! Must have for babies!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this for my son for his Christmas present after we read reviews saying the non stationary ones were not safe. This is one of the best purchases we received. My son got it around 5 months. He loved it and it helped to strengthen his legs. He started walking at 9 months and could have started earlier but we were apprehensive to try. He still plays with it and enjoys it in his play pen!! Great walker and activity center!! Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: espyce

customer_reviews.title: go this to keep my little one busy
customer_reviews.text: My son is a fast crawler & loves to be all over the place. Having this helps keep him entertained in a confined space while I get ready. Lots of different things to keep his interest. Musical pieces similar to a piano, music that goes when you turn pages of a book; different activities to encourage their learning (up & down penguins, etc). Nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great for moms with infant and toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my infant and my toddler. It’s big enough for my 5 month old who can already touch the ground with his feet. My toddler can play with the other side of the toy while my youngest plays on his side. They both love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mustwillo

customer_reviews.title: The BEST 5 STAR
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot if activity centers/walkers/jumpers and this is my son's FAVORITE. If I had to choose one toy to have for my child this would be it. It can keep him entertained for a very, very long time. He is always excited to wake up in the morning and play in this. So much to do!
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyDavid

customer_reviews.title: Great for developing motor skills
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this for maybe 1 month. He is 9 months right now and nearly walking. I believe this toy truly helped him learn to walk faster and interact with different toys. Now he just needs to learn to balance.
customer_reviews.author: dmoks

customer_reviews.title: Lovely addition to my growing baby amusement park
customer_reviews.text: Our little girl (7 mo./18 lbs.) loved this from the get-go. Easy for me to assemble (mommy) following images. A little dusty in the box for big parts but main toys are packaged and clean. I favor Baby Einstein but this had a lot more good reviews. Great price for comparison as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bright Starts 3-in-1 Around We Go Activity Center, Ages 6 months Plus
product_meta.description:
Color:Around We GoRunning around in circles can be a good thing! Meet the most active activity center for your baby. The seat rotates all the way around the baby activity saucer. Your bold baby can run and play in one place! Let your little one move from toy to toy and back again (while staying right in your line of sight). This standing table from Bright Starts includes 15 activities: No boredom here.

BRAND STORY
By Bright Starts
feature_bullets: More movement, more giggles, more happy moments
Award winning sitting to standing Walker
Baby Walker rotates around activity center
Walker seat can be removed when baby outgrows it. Suitable for child less than 30” tall

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,365 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
